manawa himikam prawardhanaya ha aarakshawa yana mayen ee mahatha siya adahas dakwa thibe.athurudanwuwan 5,679k sambandhayen digu kalaka sita thorathuru soya balima sandaha anuprapthika rajayan samanga eksath jathinge balahathkarayen saha swechchawen nowana athurudanwuwan sambandha kriyakari kandayama samanga eekabaddhawa katayuthu karana bawa sandahan kara thibena aacharya palitha kohona mahatha ee sambandhayen anthar aayathana yanthranayak pihituwa thibena bawa da penwadi atha.pasugiya marthu masaye jagath manawa himikam kawunsalayedi shri lankawa sambandhayen sammatha karagath warthawe sandahan athurudanwuwan 59k pilibandawa me wasare juni masaya wanawita rajaya prathichara dakwa thibena bawa da ee mahatha sandahan kara atha.eksath jathinge sammuthinta anuwa shri lankawa katayuthu karana bawa penwadi thibena shri lanka nithya niyojithawaraya manawa himikam surakshitha kirima ha prawardhanaya, nawatha padinchi kirima, bimbomba iwath kirima, nithiye aadhipathyaya ha siwil paripalanaya sthapitha kirima, yatithala pahasukam sanwardhanaya kirima, jiwanopaya sanwardhanaya kirima, idam gatalu nirakaranaya kirima, punaruththapanaya athulu wadasatahan rasak danatamath kriyathmaka kara thibena bawa da sihipath kara thibe..
